Address.label: Address
Address.value: 601 JEFFERSON STREET,SUITE 3400, HOUSTON, Texas, 77002, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: KBR (formerly Kellogg, Brown & Root) is global provider of technology, integrated engineering, procurement, and construction delivery, and operations and maintenance services. The company's business is organized into two segments: government solutions and maintainable technology solutions. KBR has customers in more than 75 countries, with operations in 40, and employs 36,000 people. The firm generated $7.3 billion in revenue in 2021.
